info.title: ERIC Metadata Search
info.description: Retrieves metadata from the ERIC database based on search queries.

get.description: Search ERIC metadata records based on provided query parameters.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search string for core fields (title, author, source, subject, description) or specific fields using advanced syntax.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Specify the response format: xml (default), json, or csv.

parameters.name: rows
parameters.description: Number of records to return (1â€“2000). Default is 20.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of fields to include in the response (e.g., title, author, description).

200.description: Successful retrieval of ERIC metadata records.
